title: Internet service provider market share in Australia fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 5 number of Telecommunications Companys.
Telecommunications Company Telstra has the highest Market share and Australia Other has the lowest Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Telecommunications Company is 35.3.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Telecommunications Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 5 number of Telecommunications Companys.
Telecommunications Company Telstra has the highest Market share and Australia Other has the lowest Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Telecommunications Company is 35.3.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Telecommunications Company, and Market share in each Telecommunications Company on the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
Second maximum Market share is found at Telecommunications Company Optus.
The Market share of Telecommunications Company Australia Other is 4.21% smaller than the maximum value at Telstra.
Market share at Telecommunications Company Telstra is 46.3 , second place is Optus at 15.9, and thirdly is iiNet at 15.1.
The Telecommunications Company Telstra has 2.32 times more Market share than average.
Summing up the values of all Telecommunications Companys, we get total 99.9.
